Of course, if a brawl wanders too close to this mouse while he is playing, he can't help but grab a few fellows and have them join in on his song!

He has been known to use other's faces to play a riveting scale on the piano so most mice keep their scuffs well clear of this large artist.

location.location_text: Claw Shot City, Gnawnian Express Station

stuffy_banker.name: Stuffy Banker
stuffy_banker.description: Though not the most popular mouse in the region, this little guy has incredible business sense and a lucrative task at hand. Fortunately for you hunters, this mouse likes to keep his money close to him at all times, so you'll find plenty of gold in his pockets!

location.location_text: Claw Shot City, Gnawnian Express Station

tonic_salesman.name: Tonic Salesman
tonic_salesman.description:
This mouse has the uncanny ability to sway large groups of mice into purchasing his wonder-cures. Ever overheat on days where the clouds are hiding from the bright sun? Why you my friend, YES YOU, might just have cloud-dysproximita!

Drink this here clear tonic and you'll feel refreshed! It's a wonderful tonic, isn't it? It is most definitely not just simple water. No, not at all! It is a sacred elixir from the far away lands of 'Mountain'.

How about you, friend? Your coin purse looks mighty heavy! Why, I am sure I could sell you a strength tonic that would make that purse feel as light as an empty satchel!

location.location_text: Claw Shot City, Gnawnian Express Station

upper_class_lady.name: Upper Class Lady
upper_class_lady.description: Heir to a wealthy family, this mouse has left the comforts of home and ventured forth on her own in search of adventure and the unknown. Though she may not know everything there is to know about this bold frontier, she has proven to be more than capable of handling herself and has been rumoured to be running with several different dangerous gangs!

location.location_text: Claw Shot City, Gnawnian Express Station

aether.name: Aether
aether.description:
Very little is properly known about this mouse. The records that were recovered from the library state that during one of Zugzwang's experiments, this mouse was accidentally pulled into reality, or almost... 

It would seem that anytime this mouse is caught, it soon returns. Maybe there are a legion of them loosely poised on the edge of our reality or perhaps there is just the one haunting mouse wandering Zugzwang's property. We may never know...

bookborn.name: Bookborn
bookborn.description: Most of the magical mice infesting Zugzwang's library are created by Zurreal who manipulates the magic of the tomes to spring to life devious servants. Some of the tomes have been so twisted by dark magic that mice seem to spring from these dangerous books at an unimaginable rate.

effervescent.name: Effervescent
effervescent.description: This mindless construct is effectively a walking magic battery. Its technology allows it to travel around Zugzwang's library literally pulling the magic from ancient tomes. As the pure magic is absorbed, it is processed and stored within the magical shell of the mouse. Due to the imperfect nature of the magic refinement process it tends to look unstable, flaring into small bubbling sparks that give this mouse his odd name. Once an Effervescent Mouse has gathered enough magic it will report to its creator Zurreal the Eternal for siphoning.

explorator.name: Explorator
explorator.description: These little guys were some of Zurreal the Eternal's first creations. Zugzwang's magical library is so expansive that parts of it are still unexplored; it is much bigger on the inside than on the outside. Legions of these mice are created to travel the great halls and map the tower, but their efforts continue to fail. Either the creations are not intelligent enough to map out the library effectively, or the library's magics make it impossible to reach the ends.

flutterby.name: Flutterby
flutterby.description: These magical sprites are created as tireless assistants by Zurreal the Eternal. Simple-minded and very tiny, they tend to travel in packs to accomplish the various tasks put forth by their dark master; be that collecting far off tomes of knowledge, repairing his throne or pillaging the daring hunter. Because these magical constructs are not actually living, they fear nothing. If they see cheese on a trap they will not hesitate to swarm it. Be warned!

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: A combination of magic and technology provided by Zurreal, this mouse has been influential in his efforts to break into Zugzwang's library. Fortunately, no living mouse can enter the library due to the powerful magical shields guarding the space. Unfortunately, that doesn't prevent a clever non-living construct from slipping through the defenses and letting in the more destructive creations from these relentless foes.

pocketwatch.name: Pocketwatch
pocketwatch.description: Don't let their small size fool you; Pocketwatch Mice can hold a massive amount of potential energy stored within their high-tension springs. As books are knocked from shelves these small mice unleash their energy to slash pages to pieces using their paws and tail.

scribe.name: Scribe
scribe.description: Scribe mice scan books within the library at an incredible rate, constantly searching for and documenting any information that can be used to Zurreal's advantage.

steam_grip.name: Steam Grip
steam_grip.description: These powerful mice smash entire bookcases with their powerful paws. If a hunter threatens Zurreal's powerful forces, the Steam Grip mouse will not hesitate to use its powerful, destructive strength against a hunter's trap, no matter how powerful that trap may be. Now THAT is POWERFUL!

tome_sprite.name: Tome Sprite
tome_sprite.description: This mouse is made entirely of Magic Essence and has one goal: destroy books containing knowledge of mouse weaknesses hidden in Zugzwang's library. Luckily, however, every so often this mouse needs to recharge its powers and will seek out SUPER|brie+ for more power.

walker.name: Walker
walker.description:
When a valuable book or tome is discovered, Walker Mice are used to transport the book to a safe location where it can then be studied by Scribes.

Watching this mouse walk can be quite humorous: its steady, concentrated gaze contrasts with the tiny steps its otherwise loud robotic suit makes.

zurreal_the_eternal.name: Zurreal the Eternal
zurreal_the_eternal.description:
Madness and the desire for power is enough to drive most bad mice to villainous acts against humans; however, Zurreal took his greed much further, turning even on his own kind.

Zurreal is the only known living mouse to make it into the library through Zugzwang's protective enchantments. The process of passing through the powerful shields nearly killed this relentless mouse, but in the end it could not stop him.

Once inside, he began his devious plot to steal all of the knowledge of the library, destroy the research and then use the boundless knowledge as a weapon against humans and mice alike.

Through his gathering of power it has been speculated that he may be unstoppable, as countless hunters have claimed to have captured him, only for another hunter to exclaim the same thing.

He has no known allies aside from the magical and technological creations that surround him, who aide in his dark and seemingly eternal task. If you can capture this mouse, even just to set his dark plans back, surely the reward will be great.

corrupt.name: Corrupt
corrupt.description:
Long before the curse descended on the Cursed City, this mouse was known for his disreputable rituals. Since then, however, he has gained in power immensely, and aids in perpetuating those curses.

Hunters can actively work to dispel these curses and pursue the Essence Guardian Mouse, but the Corrupt Mouse will periodically check in to renew them, so you'll have to remain vigilant!

cursed_enchanter.name: Cursed Enchanter
cursed_enchanter.description:
Once a simple enchanter that dabbled in the occasional, innocent world-ending enchantment, this mouse fell victim to the curse that befell all living in the city and now turns his attention to darker matters.

There have been reports of missing heirlooms, locks of hair clipped from unwitting passers-by, and crazed laughter emanating from empty corners. Nobody knows just what he's up to, but it can't be good.

cursed_engineer.name: Cursed Engineer
cursed_engineer.description: Robotic limbs!  Crazy concoctions!  Huge explosions!  Since the day his lab was lost and his entire city phased into an entirely different realm, the Cursed Engineer Mouse has observed no bounds in expense, ethics, or possibility when experimenting with Science.

cursed_librarian.name: Cursed Librarian
cursed_librarian.description:
There are some books that change your outlook on life so profoundly that you can barely remember who you were before you read them. Then there are books that literally warp your mind so much that nothing of who used to be remains.

There are some things no mouse was ever meant to read.

cursed_thief.name: Cursed Thief
cursed_thief.description:
Since the fall of the Cursed City, this thief has been nearly everywhere and stolen nearly everything. Priceless artifacts, powerful relics, heaps of gems and gold - and all purely for the thrill of it.

Lately he's had trouble thinking of interesting and challenging things to steal, and has begun terrorizing hunters by stripping their traps of cheese in an unprecedented campaign of terror and larceny.

dark_magi.name: Dark Magi
dark_magi.description: This mouse is said to have been one of the first to walk these lands. Shrouded in darkness, he whispers cursed promises to those weak of heart. Anyone foolish enough to strike a deal with this sinister foe will surely find themselves forever lost with their wishes twisted to his intent. This mouse has formidable powers not of this world, and anyone seeking to hunt him will have to steel their soul and prepare to live a cursed life. Everything to do with this mouse comes with a price...

essence_guardian.name: Essence Guardian
essence_guardian.description: Still dressed in the garbs from her latest raid in the Twisted Garden, this mouse guards powerful Garden Essences within her magic satchel. This mouse is safe from hunters while they remain cursed, but if a hunter can dispel them, they may just have a chance at catching her and the valuable loot she carries. Be warned though, even when not protected by the powerful curses of this corrupted land, she is not a foe to take lightly!

derr_chieftain.name: Derr Chieftain
derr_chieftain.description: The leader of the Derr Tribe is eerily calm as they organize the tribe to pursue their goal of dominating the entire island. Ruthless, merciless and without remorse, the Derr Chieftain is a powerful force that commands respect from their entire tribe.

gladiator.name: Gladiator
gladiator.description: Combining ancient melee training with the primal magic of a Seer mouse results in this massive and intimidating Gladiator. With their colossal strength, their role is to destroy any enemies that would threaten the Derr Chieftain.

grunt.name: Grunt
grunt.description: The strongest mouse of the Derr Tribe, this mammoth gathers supplies and easily carries them back to the village. The Grunt mouse possesses a keen work ethic, proudly shouting "I AM GET ITEMS!" as they enter the village, eager to return to the jungle to gather more.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: Trained warrior for the Derr Tribe, the Guardian mouse is chosen by the tribe's leader and entrusted with the role of protecting the village. They will fight with unyielding might and never show mercy in order to protect their tribe.

mintaka.name: Mintaka
mintaka.description: The Mintaka mouse is a master of camouflage. By the time a hunter sees one, it is often too late. This mouse hunts for cheese with great speed and stealth, easily dodging efforts to trap it.

renegade.name: Renegade
renegade.description: The Derr Tribe train their warriors to fight without discipline or regard for their own safety, making them an unpredictable and dangerous adversary. The Renegade mouse will stop at nothing to outwit a hunter's trap.

seer.name: Seer
seer.description: These mice use their vast knowledge and keen perception to predict when hunters are approaching. Long strings of failures to attract may indicate that a Seer mouse is nearby.

spellbinder.name: Spellbinder
spellbinder.description: These mice protect their tribe by casting spells on reckless hunters who set their traps too close to fellow Derr tribe mice. Be wary, as this powerful mouse stays in shape by getting a lot of hexercise.

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.description: Some believe these highly trained assassins stand in opposition to the Furoma forces, while others believe they simply work for the highest bidder. Well trained in both combat and stealth, these mice are extremely difficult to catch.

student_of_the_cheese_belt.name: Student of the Cheese Belt
student_of_the_cheese_belt.description: Students of the Cheese Belt may look peaceful and docile, but don't let them catch you off guard. Because they are fueled by their limitless hunger, a trap will hardly be able to get between this mouse and your cheese! The masters of these students apparently have learned to control their cravings but tend to have a rough time refining the young students to their ways.

student_of_the_cheese_claw.name: Student of the Cheese Claw
student_of_the_cheese_claw.description: The Students of the Cheese Claw are very direct and powerful warriors. Their masters train them never to back down from a fight and never to lose. Be wary when facing off against these well-trained warriors, for they are very determined and capable in the art of battle.

student_of_the_cheese_fang.name: Student of the Cheese Fang
student_of_the_cheese_fang.description: Students of the Cheese Fang are very agile and quick-thinking fighters. Trained by their clever masters never to miss an opening in an opponent's defense, these patient, persistent adversaries almost always catch hunters off-guard.

diamond.name: Diamond
diamond.description: Similar in rarity and strength to the gold mouse, the diamond mouse offers a high points reward to the hunter who can catch it.

location.location_text: Dojo, Harbour, King's Arms, Meadow, Mountain, Tournament Hall, Town of Digby, Town of Gnawnia, Training Grounds, Windmill

gold.name: Gold
gold.description: Significantly more rare than many other mice, this solid gold mouse is not much stronger than common mice and fetches a handsome reward.

location.location_text: Dojo, Harbour, King's Arms, Meadow, Mountain, Tournament Hall, Town of Digby, Town of Gnawnia, Training Grounds, Windmill

hapless.name: Hapless
hapless.description: These old mice refuse to side with the Furoma forces and reject the twisted agenda of the Dojo Masters. Often pushed around and the target of jokes, these oppressed mice are forced to do the bidding of their masters. Often far too weak to pose any challenge to an experienced hunter, these mice offer very little reward.

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.description: Known for its extreme rarity, speed and intelligence, the Ninja mouse is one of the most challenging mice to catch. A hunter will learn much from catching such a cunning foe, therefore the Ninja is worth a bundle of points.

archer.name: Archer
archer.description: Often seen firing their arrows over the Burroughs River and using Zombie mice for target practice, these hawk-eyed mice can split a whisker from 1000 yards.

kung_fu.name: Kung Fu
kung_fu.description: Although these mice mostly lead a tranquil life of meditation in the Zen gardens of Furoma, they shall not hesitate to defend their territory.

monk.name: Monk
monk.description: Do not let the frail look of these mice deceive you. They have spent decades perfecting their cheese-stealing abilities. For this mouse, dodging a Deathbot's attacks are a walk in the park!

samurai.name: Samurai
samurai.description: Years of intense training under brutal conditions have left this mouse truly disciplined and war-hardened. Little gets by their defense, and it's rare that you'll catch one unguarded.

worker.name: Worker
worker.description:
This mouse is most frequently found scampering around the Furoma Pagoda, repairing shattered wooden pillars. Their skills do not come cheap, and so they are sure to have a decent stash of coin in their pockets.

Due to their tremendous work ethic, few flavours of cheese are effective at distracting them from their work. They do, however, have a well-known weakness for SUPER|brie+.

draconic_warden.name: Draconic Warden
draconic_warden.description:
Each tribe hand-picks their best warriors to compete for the coveted Warden title, the highest honour among the tribes. 

Each mouse completes three challenges set before them by the tribes: one for courage, one for strength, and one for wisdom. Each success earns the brave warrior the mark of that tribe, forever acknowledging their heroic efforts.

Once a warrior earns all three marks, he has earned the greatest responsibility. He is rewarded the honour of guarding Dracano from any invaders who dare enter.

The three tribes share few things, but one thing they all share is a mutual respect of the dragon. They post these wardens to keep pesky MouseHunters from angering the dragon.

dragon.name: Dragon
dragon.description: High above the summit of Dracano circles the terrible Dragon mouse, scourge of the Tribal Isles. To this date, no trap has withstood the Dragon's fiery breath, and all attempts to hunt it have reduced the most advanced traps to smoking debris. Legend has it that the Acolyte Mice held the key to controlling the Dragon, but now that they are trapped in another realm, the Dragon mouse has expanded its territory. The Tribal Isles need a brave MouseHunter to confront this menace, before it sets its sights on Gnawnia!

whelpling.name: Whelpling
whelpling.description: Unable to find a lawful use for its degree in fashion design, the Whelpling Mouse eased its aching belly and moth-ridden purse by creating a dragon mouse costume. Because the native tribes offer gold and food to the dragon mouse in order to avoid destruction, many tribes-mice are fooled into offering gifts to the Whelpling. It manages to make a fine living for itself by visiting at night, when its suspenders and papier mache head are not as obvious.

alnitak.name: Alnitak
alnitak.description: The Alnitak mouse is the great hunter of the Elub tribe. Their skill in hunting makes them deadly with a spear, and a worthy adversary for MouseHunters.

champion.name: Champion
champion.description: The Champion mouse can transform from serene to terrifying at a moment's notice. Able to command the ocean and seas, a Champion mouse can unleash a typhoon that few traps are capable of stopping.

elub_chieftain.name: Elub Chieftain
elub_chieftain.description: Peaceful and reserved, the wise leader of the Elub Tribe wishes to one day end the conflict between the tribes. Unfortunately this leader does not approach MouseHunters with the same level of diplomacy.

mystic.name: Mystic
mystic.description: The Mystic mouse calls upon the secret learning of the ancients from the Elub tribe and uses realities beyond human comprehension to call the cheese to it from a hunter's trap. Their concentration is as powerful as their devotion to cheese. Not even a whisker shall move as the hunter's cheese vanishes before their very eyes.

pack.name: Pack
pack.description: Able to carry several times their weight, the Elub Pack mouse rummages beaches looking for supplies for their tribe. Despite their grand stature, the Pack mouse is incredibly quick, even while carrying several kilograms of water on their back.

protector.name: Protector
protector.description: The strength of the Protector mouse is its greatest asset in defending the Elub tribe. Few can understand how this mouse is capable of utilizing a sword more than four times its own weight, but none question the Protector's effectiveness with it.

soothsayer.name: Soothsayer
soothsayer.description: Renowned for their heavenly voice, the Soothsayer of the Elub tribe sings of events yet to occur. Their divine lyrics serve to protect the Elub from future dangers.

vanquisher.name: Vanquisher
vanquisher.description: Do not let the small stature of the Vanquisher mouse deceive you. Its methods of combat are tenaciously effective. A proud warrior of the Elub tribe, the Vanquisher mouse carries several weapons into battle, often throwing them with deadly accuracy at their opponents.

new_year's.name: New Year's
new_year's.description: This mouse is determined to ring in the New Year with a bang. After attending all of the parties it could find, it has emerged with someone else's oversized shirt, a tie that should be outlawed, and sixty pounds of fireworks which have been outlawed in most cities. The New Year's mouse intends to put on a light show so amazing that it lights up the sky for the rest of the year-- the only problem is that it hasn't really thought about how it's going to get off the ground.

party_head.name: Party Head
party_head.description: Whenever this mouse enters a room everyone can't help but start dancing! The Party Head Mouse can pack a dance floor quicker than you can say "PAR-TAY!".

desert_archer.name: Desert Archer
desert_archer.description: This young recruit comes from a long line of Marching Flame archers and has been eager for battle since it could stand on its two feet with the help of its tail. It may be weak in skill, but compensates with the boldness of generations past and the promise of greatness in the future.

desert_soldier.name: Desert Soldier
desert_soldier.description: This mouse is freshly recruited and still a bit wobbly in the knees. While possessing enough blood thirst for ten mice, it lacks the training to be anything more than a Desert Soldier.

vanguard.name: Vanguard
vanguard.description: This mouse had a natural affinity for scouting that recruiters were quick to notice. Training scouts in the art of hand-to-hand combat is a bit unique in the Marching Flame, though. Rather than spending months on the training grounds, they throw them directly into the first wave of the battle. If they survive, maybe they'll be promoted to something more. If not, there will always be another to step up in its place.

flame_archer.name: Flame Archer
flame_archer.description: This mouse is hardened by battle and the steadiness of its hand in the most stressful of situations has been developed through years of practice on the field.

flame_warrior.name: Flame Warrior
flame_warrior.description: Bearing the scars of battles past, this mouse has a moderate amount of experience when it comes to conquest. The Flame Warrior has been trained and wields a mighty war hammer with expertise. It is just a matter of time before it is eventually promoted to the highest ranks of the warrior mice.

inferno_mage.name: Inferno Mage
inferno_mage.description: This mage mouse has studied the darker arts of warfare under its Warmonger for years.

sand_cavalry.name: Sand Cavalry
sand_cavalry.description: This cavalry mouse has demonstrated its skill and ability by harnessing the power of the dreaded lizard on land. Should this war prove victorious, the next conquest for this mouse is the air.

sentinel.name: Sentinel
sentinel.description: Having earned the right to wear the monocle spy glass of scouts, this mouse has been newly promoted and shows promise for further advancement.

crimson_ranger.name: Crimson Ranger
crimson_ranger.description: This archer mouse has honed its skills in marksmanship and precision with every form of technological and magical edge available. While its aim may have been true before, now it can snipe the most impossible of targets. It is the most elite of its class and a true asset to its Warmonger.

crimson_titan.name: Crimson Titan
crimson_titan.description: This warrior's strength is unrivaled in all the Marching Flame with exception to its Warmonger. Glowing with pure power and energy, this mouse wields its blade with expertise and art.

crimson_watch.name: Crimson Watch
crimson_watch.description: This scouting mouse has seen the world through its bioculus spy glass for so long that it has forgotten what the world looks like without their aid. Mastering the art of camouflage, it has proved to be a most guarded asset of its Warmonger.

flame_ordnance.name: Flame Ordnance
flame_ordnance.description: This mouse has been driving the artillery Creeper Cannon for so long that it has become deaf to the outside world. The only thing that exists to it beyond the target in its crosshairs is its Warmonger signing orders.

magmarage.name: Magmarage
magmarage.description: This mage mouse has learned to harness and become energy itself. Elements, power, and people all fall before its will except for one. This mouse pledges its fealty and its life to its Warmonger alone.

sandwing_cavalry.name: Sandwing Cavalry
sandwing_cavalry.description: Having tamed both the beasts of the ground and the sky, this cavalry mouse brings terror to all who stand against it. Its only loyalties are to its Warmonger.

theurgy_warden.name: Theurgy Warden
theurgy_warden.description: This mouse has proven to be the most advanced of all mice with exception to its Warmonger alone. Should one dare to enter the presence of a Warmonger, they will only meet a swift defeat at the end of a Theurgy Warden's blazing wand.

warmonger.name: Warmonger
warmonger.description:
The Warmonger is the most fearsome general of the Marching Flame. Harnessing an inferno blade, the Warmonger makes a sweeping conquest of all that stands in its path and gives unquestioned orders down its ranks. None yet have challenged the Warmonger and lived to tell the tale.

Catching this warmongering mouse will aid hunters in better defeating future waves of the Marching Flame. When first caught, hunters will find one of three critical trap parts. However, once caught, the Warmonger will not always carry these parts with it on future encounters in order to avoid giving hunters a better chance against the tides of marching mice.

caravan_guard.name: Caravan Guard
caravan_guard.description: This mouse acts as the veins of the war - carrying the lifeblood of weapons, armor, water, and food to the battle front. An army is nothing without supplies. Failing to capture a Caravan Guard will undoubtedly strengthen the Marching Flame's forces.

crimson_commander.name: Crimson Commander
crimson_commander.description: The Crimson Commander carries its Warmonger's orders into battle. The strategy of the entire war is entrusted to these mice. Defeating them could turn the tide of the battle.

gargantuamouse.name: Gargantuamouse
gargantuamouse.description: There are two things known for certain about the Gargantuamouse. The first is that it is the only known predator of the Dragon Mouse. The second is that only a Warmonger has ever managed to harness its power. If the battle is not going well, a Warmonger will not hesitate to unleash these Draconic beasts.

gargoyle.name: Gargoyle
gargoyle.description:
Still as stone and cold to the bone, this eerie statue sits alone. 
Stare upon its ancient face and forever be locked in its embrace.
Blink and ask yourself, "Did it just twitch?", and with nothing will your cheese be switched.
O, these mice are slick! Theirs is the art to abscond.
Look away for but a tick and your cheese will be gone!

realm_ripper.name: Realm Ripper
realm_ripper.description: Seldom seen, but often felt as a buzz in the air or the smell of ozone, Realm Ripper mice bounce between dimensions at will, revelers in time and space. Because they are free to inhabit any time period and dimension, Realm Rippers seldom form any permanent allegiances, but the Acolyte Mouse has managed to bribe a number of them to ferry his minions in and out of his prison in the Acolyte Realm.

reaper.name: Reaper
reaper.description: These little guys have been working overtime ever since the MouseHunters took up the challenge to push back the mouse invasion. With the growing onslaught being launched by the King, these mice have an absurd schedule to keep up with. Don't be surprised if they take up a personal vendetta against hunters. Let down your guard for but a moment and you might find yourself too close to their scythe for your own comfort.

bitter_root.name: Bitter Root
bitter_root.description: One of the oldest living mice growing below the caverns.  Gnarled and aging but full of wisdom.  These mice thrive in the dark, damp and mouldy atmosphere, living for hundreds of years. The younger, more visibly vibrant mice of these old caves often ignore his sage advice, which is enough to make anyone bitter!

cavern_crumbler.name: Cavern Crumbler
cavern_crumbler.description: Caves crumble when the Cavern Crumbler comes crawling through! Features quite literally chiseled into their rocky surface from moving heavy stone all their lives makes each one look like their own unique living statue!

crag_elder.name: Crag Elder
crag_elder.description:
These mice are incredibly slow moving, much like the shifting tectonic plates beneath Gnawnia. The elders spend most of their time leaning up against the cavern walls, watching the younger mice and criticizing their life choices. They almost blend in completely with the rock walls, making it tough to spot out who it is exactly that's chastising you.

He's a real craggy one! Unless he gets his naps...

crystal_behemoth.name: Crystal Behemoth
crystal_behemoth.description:
This mouse is quite a rare sight! It's sleek, greasy flesh crackles with a powerful energy and it moves unlike anything the hunters of Gnawnia have ever seen before. Elegantly gliding through compacted earth, it's quite shocking to see how effortlessly this creature utterly destroys the rocks around it, as if nothing could possibly impede this beast. Fueled by Diamond Cheese, it's hard to believe that any trap could stop such raw power.

Make no mistake, though seemingly lacking anything resembling eyes, it is far from blind. This creature can probably sense you through even the thickest layers of rock.

crystal_cave_worm.name: Crystal Cave Worm
crystal_cave_worm.description: A mineral-seeking underground cave worm mouse! This mouse is as powerful as it is terrifying. They can pick up on their own vibrations that they create by tunneling though the earth to "echolocate" minerals in the ground. Watch your step when one is near; the ground below your feet may be less stable than it appears...

crystal_controller.name: Crystal Controller
crystal_controller.description:
One with the crystals, the Crystal Controller can crystallize any liquid on command. He can instantaneously crystallize his sweat into a protective suit of hardened crystal whenever threatened and, like a porcupine, he can shake the shards loose, tossing these crystals offensively at a predator.

He can step across a pond safely, solidifying the liquid below his feet, but the crystals he leaves behind dissolve easily in water and have a uniquely salty flavour to them! Ew.

crystal_golem.name: Crystal Golem
crystal_golem.description: Powerful resonating crystals make up the body of this crystallographical golem.  The energy coursing through these shards generates the power that allows the golem to change shape from its crystalline structure to its solid, cheese-loving mouse body.

crystal_lurker.name: Crystal Lurker
crystal_lurker.description:
A mouse consisting of a pure, hardened crystalline structure, he is highly unstable and insatiably hungry for gemstones. Its supernova core immediately heats up the consumed materials to repair, extend and expand its body. The immense heat and pressure inside the chest cavity of this mouse super-heats the air around it, causing small bits of rock to float within the cloud of hot air surrounding the mouse.

The Crystal Lurker always stays lean and never grows too large. The constant and vigorous digging and foraging through the caverns can cause quite a few chips and broken pieces!

crystal_observer.name: Crystal Observer
crystal_observer.description:
These mice seek out, sort and store all manner of minerals, gemstones, diamonds, and other delicious crystalline edibles within the Fungal Cavern. They determine which stones are suitable for consumption of energy.

With an eye for clarity, cut, karat and colour, this gemologist is always on the lookout for that deliciously special gemstone snack! Mmm!

crystal_queen.name: Crystal Queen
crystal_queen.description:
Constantly competing to be outfitted with the best crystals available, the Crystal Queen scavenges for gems to flaunt and display proudly to the other mice. Loyal followers help gather crystals and share them with her to hopefully garner affection for their hard work and devotion.

The Queen with the biggest crystal flourish gives all the orders!

crystalback.name: Crystalback
crystalback.description: Covered in softly glowing crystals, this mouse provides much needed lighting to the mice working deep underground.  Scurrying around through the network of caves creates quite a light show spectacular, if you get the right viewing angle!

crystalline_slasher.name: Crystalline Slasher
crystalline_slasher.description:
Driven mad with mineral madness, this stalker sulks around searching for delicious minerals to feast upon, even if they do not belong to him. Mice are lucky if they only encounter a Crystal Slasher once in their life.

Despite his unpredictable rage, this mouse actually gets along quite well with the Fungal Fodder mice. Maybe it's because they don't carry precious stones around with them, but together they get into some serious trouble!

diamondhide.name: Diamondhide
diamondhide.description: Deep within the hardest crusts of the winding caverns lies the Diamondhide! With a tough leathery hide, encrusted with super-hard diamonds, this mouse can claw through solid steel and eat gemstones and diamonds raw for breakfast!

dirt_thing.name: Dirt Thing
dirt_thing.description: Quite dirty and mossy!  This mouse embodies a living dirt golem.  Growing up underground without much running water can lead to this kind of look.

floating_spore.name: Floating Spore
floating_spore.description: A floating fungal spore mouse that has uprooted and is beginning to look for a new, more fertile home to sprout roots and grow!

funglore.name: Funglore
funglore.description: The fabled mouse made strictly from living fungal energy!  Constructed from cascading cave fungus similar to what grows along the cavern walls.  Tough to spot but this mouse will reward you with quite the fungal bounty if caught.

gemorpher.name: Gemorpher
gemorpher.description:
This mouse has learned to adapt its body to its environment using biological camouflage. Able to morph into any of the geological stones located within the Fungal Cavern allows them to hide from and surprise others.

Current reigning hide and seek champion of the Fungal Cavern!

gemstone_worshipper.name: Gemstone Worshipper
gemstone_worshipper.description: Obsessed with the shiny, powerful rocks found below the surface.  These mice spend their lives scouring for the biggest, brightest gemstones they can find to lord over their peers.

huntereater.name: Huntereater
huntereater.description:
The Huntereater is friend to no mouse or man! Encrusted with gemstones, it waits for other gem-enriched mice to wander by looking for food before ambushing them! Her blood-red ruby-like tail is incredibly beautiful and appears incredibly similar to a Flameshard, the symbol of the Marching Flame of the Fiery Warpath! Did the Warmonger create the totems for his army in the image of the Huntereater's tail, or is this the source of the Flameshard itself?

Though precious and beautiful, the tail is extremely venomous and tricks other mice into grabbing at it, believing it to be a simple gemstone.

lumahead.name: Lumahead
lumahead.description:
One of the most illuminating mice to be found in the Caverns. Fancy and very old fashioned, he sports the latest in fungal flourished pants topped with a fancy fungal fedora.

This mouse pulls off a look that not many can.

mouldy_mole.name: Mouldy Mole
mouldy_mole.description: The Mouldy Mole shuffles around mostly blind but still able to see the light fluorescent glow emanating from the various fungi throughout the caverns.  Fumbling around in the dark, he sometimes mistakes stones for tantalizing mould spores resulting in one too many chipped teeth!

mush.name: Mush
mush.description: Preferring to take shelter deep underground, the Mush mice pick nice, damp and warm locations to spend the majority of their life.  Mostly stationary, they will uproot and hop around when something interesting captures their eye.  This is probably the one mouse that would be easier to catch without a trap by just picking them up!

mushroom_sprite.name: Mushroom Sprite
mushroom_sprite.description:
This devilish Mushroom Sprite Mouse haunts the depths of the Fungal Cavern. A terror in her own right, she goes about screaming and spooking those that share the dark caverns below. Her camouflage allows her to scurry between the fungus without being seen.

If a mushroom looks out of place or there is suddenly a new patch of fungus that wasn't there before, watch out!

nightshade_masquerade.name: Nightshade Masquerade
nightshade_masquerade.description:
The highest class from the lowest depths of the caverns. Dressed in a glowing nightshade leaf gown accompanied by a fancy masquerade mask, this mouse is trying its best to be fancy among the filth and fungus.

Her glamorous lifestyle has given her a taste for SUPER|brie+ and she will only make an appearance in public if there is some of this highly sought after cheese on your trap.

quillback.name: Quillback
quillback.description: These sleepy little guys take it easy down under.  They mostly live hunched over and roll around looking for food.  Once they find it, they usually nap and keep it safe and warm underneath them leaving a nice, warm breakfast for when they decide to wake up.  Their big, sharp quills keep other mice away, giving them all the time in the world to finish their food.

shattered_obsidian.name: Shattered Obsidian
shattered_obsidian.description:
Raw, spiritual mousey energies from within Gnawnia have exploded throughout the deep caverns. The mousey energy looks to consume raw gemstones and minerals to keep a physical form preventing them from dispersing back into the ether.

Without constantly consuming minerals, these mice's bodies will become unstable and fall apart.

spiked_burrower.name: Spiked Burrower
spiked_burrower.description: Shows up when least expected, the Spiked Burrower swims through the dirt as though it were water, thanks to his many spines. This makes him one tough target to track down!

splintered_stone_sentry.name: Splintered Stone Sentry
splintered_stone_sentry.description: Posted up at major intersections throughout the caverns, the sentries make sure everyone keeps moving and nothing clogs up the passageways.  It is very tempting for those fungus mice to just post up and start growing in the most inconvenient locations, so someone has to keep them moving them along!

spore_muncher.name: Spore Muncher
spore_muncher.description: Spore Muncher mice have a poor sense of sight that is offset by the glowing spores that grow along their backs.  This symbiotic relationship allows these mice to find other spores.  This is also partly self-preservation, as they tend to ignore any blue-hued fungus, thinking it could just be another Spore Muncher.

sporeticus.name: Sporeticus
sporeticus.description: The Sporeticus Mouse fights to lead his mousey brethren out from the darkness of the caves and out into the sun!  Whispers of a world beyond the closed, cavernous walls, with cheese beyond the imagination, drive this little explorer to find a way out!

stalagmite.name: Stalagmite
stalagmite.description: The Stalagmite Mouse wanders the cavern floors collecting all the delicious mineral deposits dripping from the caverns stalactites.  Whatever doesn't make it in his mouth usually ends up collecting upon his back.

stone_maiden.name: Stone Maiden
stone_maiden.description: A marvelous and statuesque mouse held together and animated by some pretty powerful fungal tendrils. It slowly stalks the cavernous halls of the underground passageways, its pounding footsteps echoing loudly.

agitated_gentle_giant.name: Agitated Gentle Giant
agitated_gentle_giant.description:
Normally a quiet, loving and caring creature. However, it seems something has upset him, sending him into a mild, butterfly-induced rage.

With all those thorns in his sides, I wonder if he would calm down if someone were to remove them?
agitated_gentle_giant.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

brawny.name: Brawny
brawny.description:
Born to Rift! This mouse spends all day Rifting, sets upon sets of Rifts. If it wasn't obvious already, all he does is Rift! His shiny, shimmering, splendid muscles gleam bright white in the sun, showing off all of his hard work. He is, however, not as bright as his brawn. He is more likely to get caught in your trap trying to bench it instead of going after the cheese.

Looking at the other mice he thinks, "Do they even Rift?"
brawny.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

cyborg.name: Cyborg
cyborg.description:
Built with bionics from the beyond, this cybernetic organism has living tissue stretched over a metallic endoskeleton. It seems to focus on environment analysis but has some nasty self-defence mechanisms built-in as well. Be wary.

The Cyborg can't be bargained with. It can't be reasoned with. It doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And it absolutely will not stop, ever.

dream_drifter.name: Dream Drifter
dream_drifter.description:
Flying high above the mist of the Rift, consumed by dreams and eternal slumber, the Dream Drifter creates clouds and skies full of wonder and magic. Able to navigate the sky while sleeping, both the dream world and the Rift world are blended into one in his mind. When he dreams of happy memories, the skies turn bright, calm and clear.

But beware the nightmares: One should fear the darkness and storms when they come, for it means the Dream Drifter is troubled, and not too far away...
dream_drifter.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

excitable_electric.name: Excitable Electric
excitable_electric.description:
Lightning storms within the Rift are unlikely to be caused by an actual weather system. Instead, concentrated electrical anomalies on the surface charge up the air. Closer inspection of these anomalies has shown that they originate from within the mice themselves!

Coursing with electric currents, this mouse acts like a reverse lightning rod. His shocking subatomic particles allow him to absorb and store large amounts of electric ions from the atmosphere into which he can easily release with a wave of his hand!
excitable_electric.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

goliath_field.name: Goliath Field
goliath_field.description:
Sleeping for centuries at a time, the Goliath Field mouse is a Rift wonder in itself. The Rift energies flow through the Goliath mice, allowing life to grow around them as they slumber. Some believe their dreams influence what grows on them. A Rift-seeking hunter would be incredibly lucky to see one moving in his lifetime.

You'll feel a tremble at first, followed by seismic shaking. That low rumbling off in the distance turns into a roar as mountains crash together all around you! That's when you know... it has awakened.

greyrun.name: Greyrun
greyrun.description:
Tearing up the Rift rock with the wake she leaves behind, the Greyrun Mouse is known for her tremendous swiftness and agility! The speed that she can achieve allows her to leap and travel long distances, overcoming obstacles with ease.

Once she has her eyes set on you, there's no getting away from this one!
greyrun.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

micro.name: Micro
micro.description:
Smaller than a single blade of Riftgrass, he has a hard time being heard let alone being taken seriously! Frustrated with being constantly overlooked by everyone, he tries to climb as high as possible to have a chance at being heard!

If you listen carefully enough you can hear him saying "I get no respect!"
micro.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

mighty_mole.name: Mighty Mole
mighty_mole.description: Seemingly blind, this mouse uses a sixth sense to find his way around. Coupled with his mighty claw, navigating the Rift is no obstacle. Easily able to claw through the hardest Riftrock, no String Cheese is beyond his reach.
mighty_mole.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

raw_diamond.name: Raw Diamond
raw_diamond.description:
More than just precious stones, this embodiment of diamond and mouse is quite exquisite. The mysteries of the Rift have given this mouse a strong affinity with the mineral, allowing a supernatural bond between the two.

Her diamonds sing to her and let her know their captured stories and secrets that they have seen throughout the ages.
raw_diamond.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

rift_guardian.name: Rift Guardian
rift_guardian.description:
As cold as the stone of which they are made, these magical beings of unknown origin stand guard to keep the riffraff out of the Rift.

With him he carries his eternal companion, Mjouslnir, a powerful and fearsome weapon of incredibly destructive force.

riftweaver.name: Riftweaver
riftweaver.description: This mouse is truly one with the Rift.  The Riftweaver has the uncanny ability to tap directly into the Rift and seemingly mold it as she desires. So in-tune with her surroundings, this brown-furred mouse has become part of the world around her. Wild growths protrude from her body and lend to her mastery of her abilities. Seems as though the bigger the tendrils, the more powerful she becomes!
riftweaver.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

shard_centurion.name: Shard Centurion
shard_centurion.description: Granite mice descend from these hulking stone monstrosities adorned by powerful living shards. With golden eyes, an onyx crown and intricate markings, these living statues look to be built with remarkable craftsmanship.

spiritual_steel.name: Spiritual Steel
spiritual_steel.description: The lost souls of the long-forgotten warriors, fallen in wars long past, live on in the Rift.  Mighty armour comprised of the strongest steel known to mouse reflecting their fighting spirit protects them as they attempt to resume their duty while lost within this new world.

supernatural.name: Supernatural
supernatural.description: In tune with the Rift, he silently sits aloft amongst the clouds. You can almost hear this mouse thinking... or maybe that's the sound of him inside your head! His piercing green eyes gaze beyond what we can see and perceive. Tapping into the beyond, he is able to draw upon supernatural energies to aid him.
supernatural.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

wealth.name: Wealth
wealth.description: The embodiment of wealth and prosperity. He is draped in jaded cashmere, has pure onyx for eyes, is adorned with white gold ear plugs and ivory teeth, wears a rare stone and pearl necklace, and covers himself with pure gold skin bronzer.  He loves to be surrounded with the most lavish and luxurious things he can find.
wealth.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

angry_train_staff.name: Angry Train Staff
angry_train_staff.description:
Stern, aggressive and poor-mannered. These mice are approaching their wits' end trying to organize and keep all the passengers in order.

Between all the stowaways, haircuts, photographs and ticketless mice, it's a marvel that they still come in to work day in and day out.

Most mice would be more than happy to get off a long, boring and exhausting train ride, but for him, when one ends, it means another is about to begin.

"TICKETS PLEASE!"

automorat.name: Automorat
automorat.description:
One of the more advanced raiding automatons. Designed for maximum hull penetration and destruction.

The main goal of the Automorat Mouse is to swarm the train, dismantle defenses and take care of any resistance they may encounter.

black_powder_thief.name: Black Powder Thief
black_powder_thief.description:
Hot with black powder fever, these mice feel the need, no, the unnatural compulsion to seek out and hoard as much black powder as possible. The sight of Black Powder Charms causes these mice to go into a frenzy! Rolling in it, caressing it, smelling it and some even eating it.

They carry Magmatic Crystal Charms and Fuel Nuggets which they drop when caught, but they are no substitute for the real thing and they will stop at nothing to obtain as much black powder as possible!

Use Black Powder Charms to attract this mouse who may drop one or more Magmatic Crystal Charms when caught.

cannonball.name: Cannonball
cannonball.description: Mercilessly launched at the train in an effort to soften it up for the main raiding mice, these outdated automatons look like they are in need of a repair. Shortly after completing their launch, they drag themselves across the exterior of the train car with their mechanical arm, trying to find a way in. Both terrifying and efficient, these mice are stronger than they look and may pose a problem for some hunters!

crate_camo.name: Crate Camo
crate_camo.description:
Taking being a stowaway to the next level, the older brother of the Stowaway Mouse shows him how it's done. Using full-body crate paint, he blends seamlessly in with his surroundings which makes him a tough one to find!

Catching this mouse will earn you 2 Royal Supply Crates.

cute_crate_carrier.name: Cute Crate Carrier
cute_crate_carrier.description:
Don't let his adorable exterior fool you, inside he is one lean, mean, stealing machine!

Striving for acceptance with the other train robber mice, this little guy may be small but he gives it his all to show he's got what it takes to be part of the gang!

One determined crate at a time!

Catching this mouse will earn you 1 Royal Supply Crate.

dangerous_duo.name: Dangerous Duo
dangerous_duo.description:
Inseparable since the day they could walk, this dangerous duo has been stealing cheese from traps since they were very young. With one always watching over the other, it's nigh impossible to get the drop on these two!

Their natural skill and experience in the thieving world landed them a job robbing trains with the raiders. Though they work extremely well together, they aren't much when not together. They must be caught as a pair in order to fend off the raiders.

"Two tails are better than one!" --Famous Dangerous Duo catchphrase.

Catching this mouse will decrease the number of Raiders Left by two but is only encountered when using the correct charms.

fuel.name: Fuel
fuel.description:
The heart of the raider cause! This mouse champions for fuel and makes it his mission to gather as much of it as he can. Even those mousy automatons need fuel to operate!

Though he collects a lot of it, he gives away most of his Fuel Nuggets to the other raiding mice, so he rarely has any on him when caught.

hookshot.name: Hookshot
hookshot.description:
Light and nimble, the Hookshot Mouse is the latest and greatest in raider engineering. Fool's Gold fused with iron has created a strong, light-weight alloy. Coupled with a steam-and-crank power source, this guy is one raider who just won't quit!

Harnessing that power allows the Hookshot Mouse to fire his trademarked Hook-Paw launcher from nearly one thousand feet away, allowing them to quickly mount the train and start the assault before they can even be seen!

Many a train passenger fears the clanking of little hooks as these mice begin their attack. That definitely isn't rain you're hearing!

magmatic_crystal_thief.name: Magmatic Crystal Thief
magmatic_crystal_thief.description:
With a sharp eye, sharp clothes and a sharp shot, this is one highly intelligent Mus musculus! The Magmatic Crystal Thief Mouse uses his wits and resourcefulness to aquire magmatic crystals, though not always through legitimate means.

They carry with them some Fuel Nuggets as a temporary alternative until they can find proper magmatic crystals to fuel their science.

Use Magmatic Crystal Charms to attract this mouse.

magmatic_golem.name: Magmatic Golem
magmatic_golem.description:
Deep within the bowels of the dark and unexplored caves near Claw Shot City lives the Magmatic Golem Mouse. Accidentally stumbled upon by the pyrite miners during a deep excursion, this mighty mouse feeds on the magmatic crystals found within the bedrock below the mines.

Naturally quite a gentle creature, they have been captured and controlled by the raider mice who starve them of their crystals until they grow into a rage and then release them into the fray!

The raiders use magmatic crystals as a form of control to keep these mice in check, and hunters with the right equipment can do the same. They are dangerous mice, but they carry plenty of Fuel Nuggets with them, so it's worth the risk.

Use Magmatic Crystal Charms to attract this mouse.

mouse_with_no_name.name: Mouse With No Name
mouse_with_no_name.description:
No one knew his name... No one knew his face...

Catching this mouse will decrease the number of Raiders Left by one.

mysterious_traveller.name: Mysterious Traveller
mysterious_traveller.description:
Not much is known about this mysterious traveller. Where does he come from? Where is he going? What is his name? What does he look like? And, more importantly, why can he be only found on the Gnawnian Express?!?

Does he ever get to his destination, or is he destined to travel endlessly? Does he even have a ticket?!

passenger.name: Passenger
passenger.description:
The passenger mouse can be seen silently watching the clock, waiting for his stop. An orderly fellow, always with ticket, quiet, organized and well dressed.

This mouse has no patience for a delayed schedule!

photographer.name: Photographer
photographer.description:
Say Cheese! This ambitious mouse is never without his camera equipment. He is not so different from hunters, in that he also tries to capture every mouse in Gnawnia; except on film!

Some hunters who catch this mouse marvel at the photographs he sometimes has with him. Although too small to make out, hunters appreciate the opportunity just to see what the world is like through the eyes of a mouse!

Truly, this is Gnawnian photography at its finest!

sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
sharpshooter.description:
Winsome, striking, and full of personallity, the Sharpshooter Mouse has no problem in making her mark as most marks just sit and stare, captivated by her.

But don't let her looks fool you: She is one mean mouse with ruthless precision and perfect aim. She can shoot the tail off a Tiny Mouse at a thousand yards without batting an eyelash or even aiming down the sights!

Her signature move is a 360-degree twirl through the air, firing her shot as she comes about without looking through the scope.

Catching this mouse will decrease the number of Raiders Left by one.

steel_horse_rider.name: Steel Horse Rider
steel_horse_rider.description:
He's a cowboy who rides on a steel horse. He is wanted in Claw Shot City, dead or alive. As a result, he spends his time on the road, away from the city, to avoid the law.

He's very dangerous, carrying a loaded six-string on his back. Watch out when you gamble with this villanous varmint: He plays for keeps and he won't give it back!

His dream is to play a rock concert in front of millions.

Catching this mouse will decrease the number of Raiders Left by one.

stoutgear.name: Stoutgear
stoutgear.description:
Heavy, thick and made out of the strongest of iron, the stout Stoutgear Mouse is the pillar of raiding technology.

Though a little rusty, these mice are built strong to last long! Stoutgear mice are used as the main holding force in most raids, weakening the forces protecting the train to clear a path for the professionals. Once they get a foothold, they become a mechanical force with which to reckon!

stowaway.name: Stowaway
stowaway.description:
He loves to ride the rails! Any chance he gets, he will sneak onto the next train to leave the station without a moment's notice! Unfortunately, this train addiction of his often leaves him too broke for train fare, which is why he must hitch a ride with the boxes in the back.

Although he has easy access to the Royal Supply Crates, he'd rather not disturb them for fear his hiding spot will be discovered!

supply_hoarder.name: Supply Hoarder
supply_hoarder.description:
These mice work for the Warehouse Manager Mouse, aiding him in severing the flow of Royal Supply Crates to the Gnawnian Express so that they can get their paws on the goodies inside.

They carry up to twice as many supplies as the Warehouse Manager and are a valuable catch, so be sure to stick around during a Supply Rush!

They only appear when a hunter has caught a Warehouse Manager Mouse and a Supply Rush has been triggered. Use Supply Schedule Charms for a chance to attract a Warehouse Manager Mouse and call these mice out of hiding!

train_conductor.name: Train Conductor
train_conductor.description:
All aboard! With a blow of his whistle, he makes sure the train starts running smoothly. By smoothly, he actually means with as much madness and chaos as possible!

Bored by the usual safe and serene train travels, he yearns for each and every one of them to be exhilarating and exciting!

Hidden underneath that calm and confident exterior is the mind of a madman! One wonders what he holds behind his back, a broken brake lever perhaps?

After all, what is the point of having a train ride without a few bumps and jumps!

train_engineer.name: Train Engineer
train_engineer.description:
Personally responsible for the creation, upkeep and maintenance of the raiding automatons, this engineer goes right into the fray to keep things in smooth working order.

In their spare time aboard the train, they do their best to dismantle and salvage anything mechanical that they can get their hands on. Their trusty wrench is with them at all times, and they are truly a credit to their team.

You don't want to be on the train if these guys end up making it to the engine room...

travelling_barber.name: Travelling Barber
travelling_barber.description:
Snip, clip and a bit off the tip! Tip of the tail that is! The Travelling Barber definitely had his work cut out for him when he boarded the train, as he used to laboriously travel all over Gnawnia to keep all the mice he could looking their best! Now, the Gnawnian Express helps him move without moving! Any and all micey passengers to step aboard are welcomed with a warm shave and haircut, if they need it or not!

This also includes the local MouseHunting community. These mice will purposly get caught in traps just for the chance to work on the challenging human hairs of the hunters!

When business is slow, he can also act as a dentist in a pinch!

warehouse_manager.name: Warehouse Manager
warehouse_manager.description:
The Warehouse Manager Mouse is one of the craftier mice of the Kingdom of Gnawnia. Instead of fighting alongside other mice and facing hunters head-on, he prefers to directly circumvent the supply lines heading into Gnawnia and weaken The King's efforts before they begin.

He will only visit a hunter's trap when he believes they might hold crucial information regarding the supply shipments.

Equip a Supply Schedule Charm for a chance to attract this mouse, and catch him to trigger a Supply Rush! Catch the Supply Hoarder mice that he calls out of hiding for 5 hunts for a greater cache of Royal Supply Crates!

Catching this mouse will earn you 3 Royal Supply Crates.

curious_chemist.name: Curious Chemist
curious_chemist.description: This resident of the Great Gnarled Tree loves to combine different compounds that it finds in nature with cheeses that it pilfers from traps. An avid amateur chemist, it mixes up some seriously strange potions- things that turn fur purple, and make ears grow to ten times their size. No one knows what the Chemist’s latest potion does, or why it is suddenly seeking large amounts of Gnarled Cheese and SUPER|brie+, but one thing is for sure: the results are going to be Wicked Gnarly.

goldleaf.name: Goldleaf
goldleaf.description:
Goldleaves are known for their striking ears. They change color based on the hue of the leaves they eat each season.

Rumor has it this mouse comes from a far off land called Elunia...

centaur.name: Centaur
centaur.description: These noble mice are most often found traveling through Whisker Woods to and from Gnawnia. Known for their curiosity, Centaur mice collect cheese and other items from the various Kingdoms they visit. Although peaceful by nature, Centaur mice will not hesitate to defend their fellow mice, for they see MouseHunters as a nuisance that must be defeated.

fairy.name: Fairy
fairy.description: Do not let their size and mild temperament fool you: Fairy mice love cheese and can easily dodge a trap in order to get it. Lore states that these mice travel so quickly that they can instantly appear anywhere. Thus, when a Hunter’s cheese disappears in the blink of an eye, they often blame the Fairies.

nomad.name: Nomad
nomad.description: These migrant mice are always on the move. The cunning Nomad mice are skilled in both the art of pickpocketing and combat, capable of stealing cheese from other mice and even the most skilled of hunters.

tiger.name: Tiger
tiger.description: These fearsome mice hide in the foliage, skillfully stalking MouseHunters until they dare to leave their cheese alone. These mice will wait for the perfect moment and then pounce without hesitation, scooping up the precious cheese in a blink of an eye, and then carrying it away to feast upon it.

wicked_witch_of_whisker_woods.name: Wicked Witch of Whisker Woods
wicked_witch_of_whisker_woods.description: Most often found along the northern boundaries of Whisker Woods, the Wicked Witch mouse stalks the forest, fooling those it meets with its trickery, and offering false promises to both mouse and hunter alike. Although crafty and elusive, their efforts to remain hidden are often foiled by their own cackling laughter that sends flocks of birds out of the forest canopy.

black_diamond_racer.name: Black Diamond Racer
black_diamond_racer.description:
Speed queen of the slopes! The Black Diamond Racer has earned her name by dominating all Black Diamond courses throughout Gnawnia. She has the fastest times and quickest reflexes, and she makes sure you know it! She rides on a sleek Black Diamond Quartz toboggan. Made with REAL quartz diamonds!

"Looks like you've spent a lot of time building up a toboggan just to eat my dust!"

borean_commander.name: Borean Commander
borean_commander.description:
The terrifying Borean Commander has a mimetic ice-alloy body, consisting of an interesting form of "liquid ice"-like nitrogen. This allows for her to change her form and create different shapes out of her icy structure.

Leading the mice in constructing a lair of pure ice as a base of operations, she may be trying to build a permanent home to fend off the warmer weather so she does not have to disappear with the season.

Though she is currently constituted in the overall shape of a mouse, she may not even be one at all!

builder.name: Builder
builder.description: The head foreman in charge of the huge ice castle construction job.  With a solid ice sledge hammer, some icy blueprints with a penchant for building things, this looks to be the best qualified mouse for the job!

candy_cane.name: Candy Cane
candy_cane.description: When Santa's elves were painting candy canes this year, some wily mice snuck into the workshop and got themselves a paint job. This ruse allows them to sneak into houses, disguised as a novelty candy. On Christmas eve, they emerge from the tree and steal Santa's customary cheese and orange juice. The Candy Cane exploits the human weakness for candy, but over time, its constant proximity to sugar has given it a candy addiction of its own. That, and a nice minty smell.

christmas_tree.name: Christmas Tree
christmas_tree.description: What better way to blend into your environment and evade MouseHunters than a Christmas Tree costume!

confused_courier.name: Confused Courier
confused_courier.description:
Neither rain, nor snow, nor sleet, nor hail, nor lack of knowledge of where the addressee actually lives will keep this mouse from his appointed rounds. It just... might take a while.

Regular mail service has been semi-permanently interrupted in Gnawnia for the past few years now, but nobody has the heart to suggest replacing this little guy - he puts his whole heart into the job! So what if basically every letter ever mailed has ended up mis-delivered, if it's even delivered at all? He tries so hard!

destructoy.name: Destructoy
destructoy.description: This mouse is a prime example of how the villainous mice of Gnawnia can turn even the most fun-filled items into instruments of destruction! Don't let the playful look of this mouse fool you; it will rob you of your cheese and pillage your trap the second you turn your back!

double_black_diamond_racer.name: Double Black Diamond Racer
double_black_diamond_racer.description:
Cool, calm and collected. No longer after fame, fortune and glory, this mouse is on a lonely quest to prove to the mountain itself that he is worthy of its slopes. He fears nothing except for dishonoring the mountain peak.

Using the rawest form of Black Diamond Quartz for his toboggan gives him the most durable material but at the cost of comfort. The board is so rigid that it becomes an extension of his very soul.

"Become one with the toboggan, become one with the mountain, become one with yourself."

elf.name: Elf
elf.description: This greedy little mouse managed to infiltrate Santa's workshop by disguising himself as one of Santa's elves. Capturing this mouse will return the presents to Santa, but don't worry, he'll be sure to let you keep one! This mouse is available around Christmas.

free_skiing.name: Free Skiing
free_skiing.description:
A speed-seeking, free-skiing snow demon! As fast on its feet as it is on its toboggan. This beast literally eats the competition. With teeth like those, one can't help but wonder how many skiers he may have swallowed!

If you race with him, you definitely do NOT want to lose!

frigid_foreman.name: Frigid Foreman
frigid_foreman.description:
Tower site supervisor and hands on construction director. In charge of reading icy blueprints and making sure everything is being built to specification and on time. He also holds the keys to the tool and material site locker.


Catching this mouse will provide you with extra Tower Slabs that you can use to build your own, competing tower.

gingerbread.name: Gingerbread
gingerbread.description: Have you ever noticed a gingerbread cookie that you didn't remember baking, just casually hanging out on your counter like it ain't no thang? Well, that's not the gingerbread man trying to be sneaky, it's the Gingerbread Mouse! This portly little guy isn't actually made of gingerbread, he just dresses up like gingerbread cookies and sneaks into houses so he can eat gingerbread. From every cookie eaten, he takes a small decoration and adds it to his costume, becoming ever more convincing with every snack.

glacia_ice_fist.name: Glacia Ice Fist
glacia_ice_fist.description:
Hailing from the Glacial Alps of northern Gnawnia. This abominable snow beast is tired of living out in the cold! After hearing of the plans to create a nice, lavish Ice Fortress she was easily persuaded to join the cause.

Glacia's immense strength and acclimation to the frigid cold makes her a great asset to the cause and an incredible rival. Her unique "finesse" when working with ice also helped to persuade them to put her into a position of power.

Defeating this general will allow you to progress your Ice Tower progress to the next level.

greedy_al.name: Greedy Al
greedy_al.description:
How many betrayals would it take to change you? How many unanswered letters and un-granted wishes would you need? How long would you persevere in the face of such disappointment? And what would it do to you? How would it change you?

Many long years ago, Greedy Al was known simply as Little Albert, and he was a different child indeed. But you'll have to discover what happened in those intervening years, and then discover just how to help restore his heart.

hoarder.name: Hoarder
hoarder.description:
Hungry, Hungry, Hoarder! This general just can't get his fill of arctic asiago! Working hard at packing on those pounds to build a solid winter bulk! This mouse definitely won't be an easy pushover!

I think it may have been a slight mistake selecting this guy to be in charge of the rationing...

mad_elf.name: Mad Elf
mad_elf.description:
This sinister elf makes not toys for fun and entertainment, but rather constructs toys for destruction and chaos! The Mad Elf Mouse has long lost his sanity and now uses his toy assembly knowledge for evil by creating horrible abominations bent on destroying hunters and ultimately the Kingdom of Gnawnia!

To ensure his victory, the Mad Elf Mouse has created a protective field to weaken much of a hunter's equipment. Hunters with a powerful arcane trap will have an incredible advantage when trying to capture him!

miser.name: Miser
miser.description:
The big, bad and now broke corporate backer behind the failed Crystal Citadel escapade. Not one to give up, he still has eyes to rebuild on that empty, vacant lot.

He is furious at how the Vacant Lot has been wasted year after year on "fun" and "sharing holiday spirit"... Humbug! All that profit and prime land has been sitting there for far too long! One day his empire might rise again...

missile_toe.name: Missile Toe
missile_toe.description: When this mouse was told about the traditions of the great winter hunt, he found one to be of particular interest; though he couldn't understand why anyone would kiss while their toes are subject to laser guided missile attacks.

mouse_of_winter_future.name: Mouse of Winter Future
mouse_of_winter_future.description: Moving through the air, this mouse scatters gloom and mystery. The Mouse of Winter Future often appears before a hunter to show them a gloomy future with no hunter's group, where they are forced to hunt alone.

mouse_of_winter_past.name: Mouse of Winter Past
mouse_of_winter_past.description: The Mouse of Winter Past often stirs up childhood memories of when a hunter was a little more innocent. This moment of nostalgia makes the perfect distraction to steal a piece of cheese from the hunter's trap.

mouse_of_winter_present.name: Mouse of Winter Present
mouse_of_winter_present.description: With this jolly giant comes visions of the Tiny Mouse struggling to find a morsel of cheese. The resulting feeling of heart warming sympathy is part of a carefully designed plan to dampen the efforts of hunters during the Great Winter Hunt.

nitro_racer.name: Nitro Racer
nitro_racer.description: Not one to be left in the snow, she blasts down the mountain with canisters of nitro to keep her top speed maxed.  It's all about the speed!  Greasy, lightning fast speed!

nutcracker.name: Nutcracker
nutcracker.description: The Nutcracker mouse occasionally breaks its disciplined stance to nibble on a morsel of cheese. Watching a mouse attempt to "shell" a piece of cheddar is quite the strange sight!

ornament.name: Ornament
ornament.description: The disguise that this mouse gains from enclosing itself in a Christmas ball results in some interesting challenges when it comes time to grab the cheese. First, the mouse must roll the ornament carefully up over the trap. Then, it must thread its paw through the slots at the top in order to grab the cheese. Even if it escapes the trap in time, eating the cheese is a complicated ordeal. The life of an Ornament Mouse may be hard, but it still has a ball wherever it goes.

rainbow_racer.name: Rainbow Racer
rainbow_racer.description:
The rockstar of the toboggan racing world. Everyone who is anyone in this sport knows of the Rainbow Racer Mouse. Cutting edge toboggan tech keeps her speed maxed and obstacles are a thing of the past!

She doesn't race well with others and has a few dirty tricks up her sleeve to keep her lead.

reinbo.name: Reinbo
reinbo.description:
J. Reinbo, hardened snowball fighter, veteran of several snowball wars over the years. The only one left from his platoon without frostbite.

He has earned several "Freezies of Honour", delicious treats awarded for personal acts of valour above and beyond the call of duty.

"They threw first snow!"

ribbon.name: Ribbon
ribbon.description:
Who doesn't love ribbons? Not this mouse! She doesn't... not... love ribbons, which means she... loves them, right? Right. Right?

It all started years ago when she was given a really fancy pair of socks, but fell in love more with the packaging than the socks themselves. Since then, she's amassed a huge collection of ribbons and delights in the winter season, where everyone compliments her on her festive dress instead of giving her an odd look and crossing the street.

ridiculous_sweater.name: Ridiculous Sweater
ridiculous_sweater.description:
Oh Grandma!

Hasn't everyone gotten a sweater like this? Hand-crafted and made with so much love you can just smell it? Or is that just Grandma's gigantic bottle of perfume she bought a dozen years ago? Does it even matter?

This poor mouse is now doomed to wear this sweater forever... or at least until Grandma leaves and every time she visits.

s.n.o.w._golem.name: S.N.O.W. Golem
s.n.o.w._golem.description:
A fearsome snow golem who has been summoned by the Frozen Horde as the ultimate snowball assault weapon, the S.N.O.W. Golem (Snow-Neutralizing Obliterator of Winter) is a terrifying sight to behold.

This mouse has but one goal: To ruin the fun of every MouseHunter and destroy all the snow forts it can see. The King has sanctioned the area around his castle for construction of the thousands of snow forts required to defend against this mouse.

It will never leave, it will never stop, it will keep coming and coming until it can secure victory!

scrooge.name: Scrooge
scrooge.description: Bah, humbug! When the Scrooge Mouse leaves his house, he dampens the Christmas spirit in a wide radius around him.  His few hobbies include destroying snowmen with his cane, muttering irritably to himself and kicking over Present Mice to watch their legs flail. The other mice read a story in which a human of similar comportment got his comeuppance from a team of wily ghosts, but so far no spirits have answered their classified ad.

slay_ride.name: Slay Ride
slay_ride.description: Unlike most other mice, the Slay Ride Mouse doesn't avoid hunter's traps and instead charges at them, full speed. In the blink of an eye the cheese is gone and the Slay Ride Mouse rockets back into the sky, laughing all the way.

snow_boulder.name: Snow Boulder
snow_boulder.description:
Tasked with the tremendous responsibility to gather snow for the whole snow operation, the snow boulder works tirelessly rolling up mass amounts of snow to be used as ammunition for their invasion.

They have also been known to roll up one or two of their brethren. It's tough enough to roll up the snow, let alone watch where you're going!

snow_fort.name: Snow Fort
snow_fort.description: From the safety of a snow fort, this mouse bombards hunter's traps with tightly packed balls of snow. The snowball sets off the trap, making the cheese easy to steal.

snow_scavenger.name: Snow Scavenger
snow_scavenger.description: Even the harshest winter weather cannot stop this mouse from searching snow drifts and frozen lakes for misplaced property and other odds and ends.

snow_sorceress.name: Snow Sorceress
snow_sorceress.description:
Born in below zero temperatures, the Snow Sorceress Mouse has the innate ability to control snow. This makes her the perfect candidate as a general of the Frozen Horde Army. Her snow creations are a marvel and wonderment to behold as well as surprisingly dangerous! And she loves to create snowmen! Fortunately for her, the ones she has created last forever and have been bestowed personalities of their own.

Watch out if you see her coming because her frosty friends won't be that far behind!

snowball_hoarder.name: Snowball Hoarder
snowball_hoarder.description:
Ultimately unreliable in a snowball fight, the Snowball Hoarder Mouse can't help but compulsively make and collect snowballs.

He is excellent for supplying mass amounts of ammunition... if you can manage to pry them away. Anyone that comes for them will be attacked.

"Mine! ALL MINE!"

snowblower.name: Snowblower
snowblower.description:
If you want to build a huge snow castle, sure, you could go at it all old-school with shovels. If you wanted to take all day, anyway.

But if you want to build a huge snow castle in a couple hours, you call over this mouse and just watch him work! Walls rise in the same time it takes to brew a hot cocoa. Battlements are built while you track down a candy cane to use as a stir stick. And if you ask really nicely, he may clear your driveway afterward too.

But you're going to have to share some of that cocoa.

snowflake.name: Snowflake
snowflake.description:
Light as a feather, the elusive Snowflake Mouse can be seen drifting with the strong winter wind, using it as a means of easy Kingdom-wide conveyance. In their travels, Snowflake Mice commonly pickup various knick knacks and odd ends they find laying in the winter snow. Their love of shiny objects can, however, be used to a hunter's advantage -- use a Winter Charm and a Snowflake Mouse may visit to investigate your trap.

While racing down the toboggan courses, use a Winter Charm to attract the Snowflake Mouse who drops Toboggan Nitro when caught!

snowglobe.name: Snowglobe
snowglobe.description:
This poor mouse made the bad decision to participate in the yearly polar dip, but got scooped up mid-swim by a novelty-maker who wasn't paying close attention. The good news is that the water's much warmer where he is now, but he'd still like to get back out!

Much like a hamster in a ball, the Snowglobe Mouse runs his globe around like wild, smashing into walls and traps alike, hoping something will burst his artificial snow-filled prison.

sporty_ski_instructor.name: Sporty Ski Instructor
sporty_ski_instructor.description:
His state of the art skintight skiwear lets him cut through the chilly air with minimal resistance, letting him keep up with the fastest toboggans using only his skis! His true goal is to garner fame by winning races so that his classes can grow in popularity!

"Feels like I'm wearing nothing at all!"

squeaker_claws.name: Squeaker Claws
squeaker_claws.description: You better watch out! This sinister villain is bent on putting an end to all festive celebrations. What could be more horrifying than a massive, snarling mouse made of gooey, spoiled eggnog that is bent on destroying anything that remotely resembles happiness?
