Most people won't tell you this but his giant helm is to cover up his soft side. This way, no one can see him cry when he witnesses injustice and destruction within the Whisker Woods Rift.
centaur_ranger.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

cherry_sprite.name: Cherry Sprite
cherry_sprite.description: A lovely little Cherry Sprite Mouse!  This spirit loves to dance and sing as sweetly as the cherries they love and embody.  They are known to be quite troublesome and mischievous, though, especially when the cherries run out!
cherry_sprite.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

cranky_caterpillar.name: Cranky Caterpillar
cranky_caterpillar.description: The rift isn't always a hospitable place to live and the Cranky Caterpillar mice have trouble finding ideal spots to pupate. Left in a semi-transformed state and never fully maturing into their fluttery flying forms, these mice often live grumpy lives, living out their days stuck between stages.
cranky_caterpillar.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

crazed_goblin.name: Crazed Goblin
crazed_goblin.description: Carnage and chaos is the definition of what it means to be a Crazed Goblin Mouse.  With their bone cudgels, skullcaps and gnarled facial features, these feral Goblin mice show that they have no fear!  They will charge and topple over their fallen brethren to grab cheese out of a trap while scavenging from those that were not quite so fortunate.
crazed_goblin.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

cyclops_barbarian.name: Cyclops Barbarian
cyclops_barbarian.description: Short, stocky, strong, savage and uncivilized. Cyclops Barbarian mice are conquerors!  They seek to take the Whisker Woods Rift for their own and, with the opening of the rift, they may attempt to expand their reign into Gnawnia!
cyclops_barbarian.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

fungal_frog.name: Fungal Frog
fungal_frog.description:
Happily hopping around the stagnant waters of the Whisker Woods Rift, this amphibious mouse has a natural defense of poisonous fungus that grows along its slimy exterior.

Definitely one mouse that's hard to hold on to! Although I don't know why you would want to in the first place...
fungal_frog.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

gilded_leaf.name: Gilded Leaf
gilded_leaf.description:
This mouse soaks up the golden rays of the sun leaving her skin looking like pure 24-carat gold!

Rumor has it that a small number of these mice are actually made of gold which make them one of the more tempting reasons to brave the rift.

grizzled_silth.name: Grizzled Silth
grizzled_silth.description:
Old and wise, the Grizzled Silth Mouse is sought out for his great wisdom and he provides it to all who seek him out, even to hunters who try to capture him. He is quite elusive and prefers a hermit-like lifestyle, spending more time out of the water than in, which makes him harder to track.

Despite his age, he is not above a good fight, and will often challenge other mice with an aggressive stance.
grizzled_silth.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

karmachameleon.name: Karmachameleon
karmachameleon.description:
This sly guy is planning something mischievous! That smile is suspiciously sneaky. Known for their cunning and craftiness, these sticky Karmachameleon mice are tough to get rid of without losing copious amounts of cheese!

Their karmaflage does well to disguise their true feelings and intent until it is too late! Only they truly know what hides behind their smile.
karmachameleon.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

medicine.name: Medicine
medicine.description:
Native to the Whisker Woods Rift, these traditional spirit healers are revered for their restorative powers. By securing some "help" from the spirit world, these Medicine mice focus their lost energies into revitalizing the land and the mice of the rift.

Be careful when messing with these mice. You wouldn't want any bad juju!
medicine.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

monstrous_black_widow.name: Monstrous Black Widow
monstrous_black_widow.description:
Lurking in the deepest, darkest and most dangerous parts of the Whisker Woods Rift lies the Monstrous Black Widow Mouse. Few dare to enter her realm of the forest as none have ever returned. Extremely fast, strong and agile, one has yet to escape her clutches!

When you see those red eyes pierce the darkness, it is too late to turn back.

mossy_moosker.name: Mossy Moosker
mossy_moosker.description: One with nature.  The Mossy Moosker Mouse finds shelter in the thick, deep nest of trees within the rift that are his home.  Living in a perfectly symbiotic relationship with his environment, he is literally part of the forest.  Tread lightly!
mossy_moosker.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

naturalist.name: Naturalist
naturalist.description: Hip and in the now, wearing the latest in all-natural growth wear, he sports the tastiest natural growth potions around!  This nature-loving scientist works diligently on his all-natural organic products and concoctions.  Guaranteed to bring you one step closer to nature than you thought possible!
naturalist.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

nomadic_warrior.name: Nomadic Warrior
nomadic_warrior.description: The Nomadic Warrior mice are fierce and more aggressive than the Nomad mice of our kingdom.  Honed from roaming the harsh environment of the rift, she brandishes her blade in search of a challenge instead of a home.
nomadic_warrior.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

red_coat_bear.name: Red Coat Bear
red_coat_bear.description: The Red Coat Bear Mouse is adorned in a glorious coat of fur.  The fur varies in shades of red, directly reflecting how angry he is.  A fully rage-fueled super-bear will hunt you to the ends of the rift if it were not for your rather distracting cheese supply.
red_coat_bear.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

red-eyed_watcher_owl.name: Red-Eyed Watcher Owl
red-eyed_watcher_owl.description:
The large Red-Eyed Watcher Owl Mouse keeps a safe distance from its prey. Observing from a distance, its tell-tale eyes burn deep into the soul. It's always looking for the perfect piece of cheese to strike.

Always waiting, watching...
red-eyed_watcher_owl.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

rift_tiger.name: Rift Tiger
rift_tiger.description: Ferocious Rift Tiger mice stalk the Whisker Woods Rift looking for unsuspecting cheese.  With the lack of tall grass and bushes, these tigers have evolved special stripe-like pores which glow and emit rift-like mists to camouflage into their surroundings.
rift_tiger.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

spirit_fox.name: Spirit Fox
spirit_fox.description:
The Spirit Fox Mouse is quite playful and lively. When packs of them play and chase each other, they light up the woods and look like glowing dancing spirits.

Smart and cunning, they would be more difficult to catch aside from the fact that they enjoy toying with hunters traps!
spirit_fox.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

spirit_of_balance.name: Spirit of Balance
spirit_of_balance.description:
The Spirit of Balance is a powerful being in her own right. She does her best to keep balance and order within the woods, keeping everything running in perfect harmony.

Her powers grow and nourish the flora and fauna of the forest. When needed, she uses them to cull and destroy those which do not belong and seek to ruin the balance.
spirit_of_balance.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

treant_queen.name: Treant Queen
treant_queen.description: Ruler of the Whisker Woods Rift.  Centuries old, time has given her vast wisdom and strength. The Treant Queen Mouse keeps peace and order for all of the woodland mice.
treant_queen.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

tree_troll.name: Tree Troll
tree_troll.description: Pesky Tree Troll mice!  None too bright with skulls as thick as their leathery hide!  Worse than a bad case of termites, these goons leave all kinds of damage and destruction in their wake.  Even the other woodland mice don't seem to get along with them!
tree_troll.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

tri-dra.name: Tri-dra
tri-dra.description:
A three-headed, three-eyed guardian of the Whisker Woods Rift. A patient protector of those that dwell within the forest. Don't let his calm demeanour fool you; it would not be wise to anger this mighty beast!

Catching mice in the Deep Lagoon will eventually enrage him enough to emerge from the depths.
tri-dra.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

twisted_treant.name: Twisted Treant
twisted_treant.description:
Protector of the Whisker Woods Rift. This gnarled and twisted treant is the guardian of the forest. The magic locked away within the rift brings forth these guardians when they feel threatened!

This will be one tough brute to uproot!
twisted_treant.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

water_sprite.name: Water Sprite
water_sprite.description: These playful Water Sprite mice inhabit the Whisker Woods Rift, playing tricks and splashing other mice that get a little too close for a drink.  They also have a marvelous synchronized swimming routine if you're lucky enough to catch them at the right time!
water_sprite.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

winged_harpy.name: Winged Harpy
winged_harpy.description: Graceful and angelic.  One of the most elegant creatures to soar the skies.  Their quick speed makes them hard to spot while in motion.  Hunters need to be agile, with quick-striking traps, as these mice do not stay stationary for too long!
winged_harpy.cheese: Brie String, Magical String, Marble String, Swiss String

captain_croissant.name: Captain Croissant
captain_croissant.description:
She loves bread. That's really all you need to know. Not much else is really known about her, in fact! Is she MADE of bread? Is she inside of a gigantic robotic-like suit comprised of baked goods?

We do know she is a mouse of some kind and, being a mouse, she also loves cheese. So, naturally, Grilled Cheese would drive this mouse WILD. Cheese AND bread? TOGETHER?!

Collect Packets of Flour in the Windmill to create Grilled Cheese and free the Windmill from her breaded tyranny!

farmhand.name: Farmhand
farmhand.description: When mice ran the farmers off this tract of land, the Farm Hands ransacked their crops... and quickly learned that if they wanted more, they would have to grow it themselves. Farm Hand mice mostly eat fresh, crunchy carrots and cabbage, but if someone were to come along with a handful of that cheesy food all the city slickers are munchin' on, well, they might just be obliged to eat it.

spud.name: Spud
spud.description: No one is sure how one mouse managed to swallow a whole potato, but this is the result-- a bloated rodent prone to falling on its back. Unwilling to pass up food, even when they're still shaped like their last meal, Spud mice raid traps in order to hoard the cheese for later. Hunters have brought home large quantities of these mice by placing their traps at the bottom of a steep hill: Spud mice inevitably lose their balance while climbing them and roll to the bottom.

ancient_scribe.name: Ancient Scribe
ancient_scribe.description: The ancient scribes of the Scholar District have mastered many spells and collected many scrolls throughout their studies.  They take their lifetime of learning and transcribe it upon sacred parchments to be stored and used within the Dark Library by up and coming students.

battle_cleric.name: Battle Cleric
battle_cleric.description:
A protective clergy of battle-ready mice guard the inner-most areas of the Fealty District from intruders. Extensively skilled individuals are hand picked and personally trained by the currently appointed Paladin.

Heavy, ceremonial armour and specially-forged flanged powermaces are a clear sign that the mouse in front of you is a Battle Cleric Mouse!

decrepit_tentacle_terror.name: Decrepit Tentacle Terror
decrepit_tentacle_terror.description:
This aged, ancient, elderly, broken down, exhausted, decrepit, over-the-hill terror has been lying in wait for what seems to be an eternity to defend this long lost city district. This horror is kept alive by the same ancient powers that flow through the Manaforge, the Dark Library, and the Templar's Sanctum.

Not nearly as powerful as she once was, this shade of her former self is still quite formidable. In all of these years she still has not been replaced as the primary guardian to the hidden inner chambers of the city.

ethereal_guardian.name: Ethereal Guardian
ethereal_guardian.description: A summoned ethereal spirit, held within the physical realm contained inside of magically enchanted vestments.  Brought forth by powerful casters within the Scholar District to patrol and guard their deepest secrets.

exo-tech.name: Exo-Tech
exo-tech.description: The Tech District's strongest weakest mouse!  The Exo-Tech has developed an advanced exo-skeleton to augment his older, feeble body.   By flexing his body's strongest muscle, his mind, he can hit as hard and fast as solving quantum entanglement theory!

manaforge_smith.name: Manaforge Smith
manaforge_smith.description:
Master of the Manaforge, these incredible smiths use this workshop to imbue metal and stone with enriched magical force to create the city’s tools, weapons and eternal golem guardians. Some researchers suspect that the original smiths that created the Manaforge also created the impossibly complex mechanisms that bring the Labyrinth to life.

Strength, endurance and high intelligence make these mice quite difficult to capture, especially since they understand the mechanics behind hunters traps.

matron_of_machinery.name: Matron of Machinery
matron_of_machinery.description: All of the technological advances found within the Labyrinth and Zokor first originated within the Tech Research Center, usually from the brains of these matrons.  Their minds are networked together allowing them to collaborate and access each others' vast knowledge within seconds to create new schematics, upgrades and algorithms for new and existing technologies.

matron_of_wealth.name: Matron of Wealth
matron_of_wealth.description:
Living in the lap of luxury, this wealthy mouse watches over the Treasury District and manages the city's money. Not one to shy away from the good things in life, she tends to allocate a "little" more towards her own wages. With all the riches contain in the vault, who could tell if any went missing, right?

That gem-encrusted crystal sword and golden goblet were a justified bonus for her hard work and dedication! After all, without her spending the city's money, why would the mice be motivated to earn more?

molten_midas.name: Molten Midas
molten_midas.description:
Living within the lavish luxuries of the treasure-filled areas of Zokor lies this viscous liquid-like mouse. He can heat his body to such an extreme temperature that he can melt and then absorb nearby molten gold to increase his body mass.

He has grown quite literally attached to the gold and jewels that surround him.

nightshade_fungalmancer.name: Nightshade Fungalmancer
nightshade_fungalmancer.description: These fungalmancers have picked up a thing or two from the scholars practicing their magics throughout the Labyrinth.  Usually hidden from sight beneath their leaves, they absorb the magical energies cast out from other mice and harness them within their roots.  They wait for unsuspecting intruders upon which to test their new powers.

paladin_weapon_master.name: Paladin Weapon Master
paladin_weapon_master.description: Forged within the sacred flames of the Templar's Sanctum, the Paladin Weapon Master Mouse has become most proficient with many of the ingenious weapon designs produced within the Manaforge. He is a deadly combatant and is armed to the teeth and outfitted in the finest armour and weapons the Manaforge can produce.

retired_minotaur.name: Retired Minotaur
retired_minotaur.description:
Once young and lively, this minotaur loved racing through the hallways of the Labyrinth, chasing down hunters and mice alike, howling and bellowing with delight as they scurried at the mere sound of his hooves on the cobbled floors. But now, it seems he has run his last lap of the maze, and has settled down into cozy end-life routines. Donning his fuzzy slippers in his favourite easy chair (which is a giant sack of gold), this retired beast has had his pension paid out in full and has relocated to his secret inner chamber to enjoy his retirement in peace and quiet.

The same shenanigans that used to bring him joy now only cause him grief, and he can be seen shaking his fist from atop his tower at the other mice hustling and bustling in the city. All that noise, all that racket! What a grumpy old grump this once playful beast has become...

But even in his twilight and seemingly endless misery, he still manages to let a small grin spread across his lips whenever he causes a mouse to jump in fear at the sound of his snort or the clipping of his hooves.

No one has broken into his private chambers and lived to tell the tale. Rumor has it that he stores many great and valuable items on opulent displays. Perhaps a resourceful hunter can find a way in and nab one of these rare treasures before being caught!

sir_fleekio.name: Sir Fleekio
sir_fleekio.description: Swooned over by maiden mice everywhere, this is the most decorated, undefeated defender and combatant of the Fealty District.  Donned in custom silver armour, which looks great but has minimal effectiveness, perfect for a fighter that doesn't get hit!  The matching silver faceplate protects his perfectly symmetrical features from damage, mostly from wild debris kicked up from his furious swings.

soul_binder.name: Soul Binder
soul_binder.description:
Master of the Dark Library, enslaver of souls and an all-powerful wizard of the unknown. He believes himself to be a supreme ruler amongst all mice and is looked up to as one by his followers.

All mystics and mages of Zokor worship him. They follow his guidance and teachings in pursuit of becoming all-powerful like him. Unfortunately for them, the most powerful of his closest assistants become enslaved by him, feeding off their power and dooming them to eternal servitude.

chess_master.name: Chess Master
chess_master.description: Atop the tall tower, in the midst of an isle of madness, sits the maddest mouse of them all: the Chess Master. The Seasonal Garden and the Tower answer to his whims, changing with his mercurial moods. Behind his glowing white eyes lies the mind which produced the rage of the Technic King, and the cold brutality of the Mystic Queen. The Chess Master has the potential to create anything- but he is more likely to destroy everything.

mystic_bishop.name: Mystic Bishop
mystic_bishop.description: The Mystic Bishop's closest ally is the Rook, whose shoot-and-run tactics resemble a crude version of the Bishop's attacks. Where Rooks fail because their short range magic bursts lack precise aim, Bishops succeed by shooting off smaller bolts of arcane energy that are precise enough to penetrate weaknesses in armor and knock weapons out of enemy hands. Although they do very little physical fighting, Mystic Bishops are feared by Knights for their ability to take down armored foes.

mystic_king.name: Mystic King
mystic_king.description: Preferring to hover over the battlefield rather than recline on his throne, the Mystic King commands his armies with the force of his mind. Many Hunters assume that the Mystic King can see what move they are going to make before they make it, but this is not the case. The Mystic King's vast intellect and store of strategic wisdom simply allows him to see all possible moves before they are made, which is why he considers every move carefully before acting.

mystic_knight.name: Mystic Knight
mystic_knight.description: With armor that covers its body from head to toe, and no visible facial features except for a pair of glowing white eyes, the Mystic Knight mouse's true identity is shrouded in mystery. It admits no weakness, attacking without retreat, and never shows signs of injury. Could the Mystic Knight be a construct, or pulled from another dimension? Unless someone can remove its magically-sealed armor, Hunters may never know.

mystic_pawn.name: Mystic Pawn
mystic_pawn.description: Mystic Pawns possess the least magic of the Mystic Team pieces, but behind their weak power hides a cunning strategic brain. As the most common Mystic Team member, the Pawns play a constant game of check and balance, weighing each loss of life versus the potential strategic gain for the team. If the losses become too great, and the pawns can no longer hold their own, the Rooks will charge in to defend the Queen in their stead.

mystic_queen.name: Mystic Queen
mystic_queen.description: The Mystic Queen is a silent, cold-blooded killer, connected to her King and the rest of the team by mind link. Her moves are smooth, even calm, but one blow from her silent sword is enough to split one of the Technic King's war machines in two. Unlike all other members of the Mystic Team, the Queen needs no defender. With the ability to throw, spin and manipulate her sword using only her mind, she is the determining factor in many battles.

mystic_rook.name: Mystic Rook
mystic_rook.description: Mystic Rooks are chosen for an excess of magical charge, and relatively light body weight, so that they can perform the strange dance which gives the Mystic team a possible tactical advantage. When a Rook is called upon by the King, it rushes into battle, where it takes aim and readies its magical charge. When the charge explodes from its palms, the Rook is blown so far back that it lands in friendly space again.

technic_bishop.name: Technic Bishop
technic_bishop.description: The Technic Bishop's unwieldy hat and fussy cape may give off the impression that it is better off sitting in a pulpit than fighting a war, but don't be fooled: the Technic King dresses his best fighters up this way to encourage the Mystic team to disregard them. The Technic Bishop is a master of distraction. While the other pieces are fighting head-on, it dashes in from an angle, smiting Mystic fighters of all descriptions with its solid-gold staff.

technic_king.name: Technic King
technic_king.description: With the methodical moves of a ticking clock, the Technic King pushes his armies into battle, calculating their attacks using cold, hard logic. If this King needs to lose a few pawns to gain the victory, so be it. He's also not afraid to use a little firepower, as evidenced by the secret weapon hiding under his crown. Some people call this mouse fearless, but perhaps he is better understood as a dangerous eccentric; his throne sounds as though it will explode at any second and his crown could probably level the tower.

technic_knight.name: Technic Knight
technic_knight.description: The King may rule using strategy, but when it comes to down-and-dirty fighting, the Technic team relies on its Knights to punch, slice and bludgeon their way to victory. Knights prefer a more 'paws-on' approach to combat than most other pieces, using their ability to swerve and double back on enemies to achieve many surprise victories. The key to defeating a Knight is to find a weakness in its armor- once the Knight is compromised, its heavy equipment prevents quick retreats.

technic_pawn.name: Technic Pawn
technic_pawn.description: Technic pawns are sometimes seen as expendable by their bigger brethren, because they are the smallest, and the most numerous of the Technic team mice, but in reality, they form a key part of the Technic team's strategy. As the first line of attack against the Mystics, pawns push the enemy back, moving ever forward into the fray without giving an inch. Take out enough pawns, and the rest of the Technic Team becomes vulnerable.

technic_queen.name: Technic Queen
technic_queen.description: The Queen, Technic's fiercest warrior, has a presence so terrifying that mice from both armies attempt to flee the battlefield when they hear her engines roaring toward them. Very few mice have survived to tell the tale of being caught in her wake, and those that do survive recount gruesome stories of woe and wounding. Somehow you feel as though you might be doing the Technic King a favor by getting rid of his wife.

technic_rook.name: Technic Rook
technic_rook.description: When the Technic King wants a hole blown through a line of pawns, or an explosion of debris to demoralize the opposing team, he calls on the Rooks, a duo of gritty fighters who love projectiles with a passion most mice reserve for delicious brie. The Rooks specialize in serving out sudden, crushing blows, delivering a cannon shot to the other side of the battlefield and then retreating behind the defensive line before the other team's ears stop ringing.
